reviewText: These need to be remastered!! Otherwise very good..picture quality is the only problem.

Broadway's Deadly Gold was released in 1968. It starred George Nader  as FBI agent Jery Cotton in this fine B-Film. In this one Jerry helps find the gold fbars from a five million dollar robbery. Fans of George Nader will like this the most.
Jerry Cotton is one of my favourite characters in the movies!
